languages.text: {n}В ответ вы слышите только Стракса, продолжающего перечисление обвинений. Вы оглядываетесь — и встречаетесь со множеством недоуменных, испуганных, сконфуженных взглядом. Кажется, клерки Администратума немало поработали, чтобы выставить очевидно подставной суд за законный процесс.{/n}

{n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В ответ вы слышите только Стракса, продолжающего перечисление обвинений. Вы оглядываетесь — и встречаетесь со множеством недоуменных, испуганных, сконфуженных взглядом. Кажется, клерки Администратума немало поработали, чтобы выставить очевидно подставной суд за законный процесс.{/n}

The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously bogus proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

{n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die einzige Reaktion ist Strachs, der weitere Anklagepunkte anführt. Als du dich umsiehst, begegnen dir zahlreiche bestürzte, ängstliche und verwirrte Blicke. Die Beamten des Administratums scheinen hart gearbeitet zu haben, um eine offenkundig fingierte Anhörung wie ein ordentliches Gerichtsverfahren wirken zu lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

Die Beamten des Administratums scheinen hart gearbeitet zu haben, um eine offenkundig fingierte Anhörung wie ein ordentliches Gerichtsverfahren wirken zu lassen.{/n}

{n}Die einzige Reaktion ist Strachs, der weitere Anklagepunkte anführt. Als du dich umsiehst, begegnen dir zahlreiche bestürzte, ängstliche und verwirrte Blicke. Die Beamten des Administratums scheinen hart gearbeitet zu haben, um eine offenkundig fingierte Anhörung wie ein ordentliches Gerichtsverfahren wirken zu lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Strachs ignore votre intervention et se contente de poursuivre sa liste d'accusations. Vous ne voyez autour de vous que regards perplexes, effrayés et confus. Les greffiers de l'Administratum semblent s'être efforcés de donner à cette procédure manifestement truquée l'apparence d'un véritable procès.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

Les greffiers de l'Administratum semblent s'être efforcés de donner à cette procédure manifestement truquée l'apparence d'un véritable procès.{/n}

{n}Strachs ignore votre intervention et se contente de poursuivre sa liste d'accusations. Vous ne voyez autour de vous que regards perplexes, effrayés et confus. Les greffiers de l'Administratum semblent s'être efforcés de donner à cette procédure manifestement truquée l'apparence d'un véritable procès.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你没有得到任何回应，斯塔克斯继续朗诵着手中的罪名清单。你环顾四周，众人也在看着你，脸上带着迷茫、恐惧、困惑的表情。看来，内政部的文员确实费了不少心思，让这场明显安排好的构陷看起来仿佛真正的审判一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你没有得到任何回应，斯塔克斯继续朗诵着手中的罪名清单。你环顾四周，众人也在看着你，脸上带着迷茫、恐惧、困惑的表情。看来，内政部的文员确实费了不少心思，让这场明显安排好的构陷看起来仿佛真正的审判一样。{/n}
{n}你没有得到任何回应，斯塔克斯继续朗诵着手中的罪名清单。你环顾四周，众人也在看着你，脸上带着迷茫、恐惧、困惑的表情。看来，内政部的文员确实费了不少心思，让这场明显安排好的构陷看起来仿佛真正的审判一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu única respuesta es la lista de cargos de Strachs, que continúa imperturbable. Pasas la vista por tu alrededor y encuentras una gran cantidad de miradas perplejas, asustadas y confusas. Los funcionarios del Administratum parecen haberse esforzado mucho para dar a este falso proceso el aspecto de un juicio auténtico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

{n}Tu única respuesta es la lista de cargos de Strachs, que continúa imperturbable. Pasas la vista por tu alrededor y encuentras una gran cantidad de miradas perplejas, asustadas y confusas. Los funcionarios del Administratum parecen haberse esforzado mucho para dar a esta evidente farsa el aspecto de un juicio auténtico.{/n}

languages.text: {n}返ってくるのは、ストラッチスが告発のリストを読み上げ続ける声だけだ。あなたが周囲を見渡すと、戸惑い、怯え、混乱した視線がいくつも返ってくる。帝国行政局の事務員たちは、明らかにでたらめなこの裁判を、いかにも本物らしく見せかけるために懸命に演出しているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}返ってくるのは、ストラッチスが告発のリストを読み上げ続ける声だけだ。あなたが周囲を見渡すと、戸惑い、怯え、混乱した視線がいくつも返ってくる。帝国行政局の事務員たちは、明らかにでたらめなこの裁判を、いかにも本物らしく見せかけるために懸命に演出しているようだ。{/n}
{n}返ってくるのは、ストラッチスが告発のリストを読み上げ続ける声だけだ。あなたが周囲を見渡すと、戸惑い、怯え、混乱した視線がいくつも返ってくる。帝国行政局の事務員たちは、明らかにでたらめなこの裁判を、いかにも本物らしく見せかけるために懸命に演出しているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cevap olarak tek duyduğun, Strachs'ın devam eden suçlama listesi oluyor. Etrafına göz gezdirdiğinde çok sayıda şaşkın, korkmuş ve duruma anlam vermeye çalışan bakışla karşılaşıyorsun. Administratum kâtipleri, bu sözde duruşmanın hakiki bir yargılamaya benzemesi için epey mesai harcamış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}All you hear in response is Strachs continuing his list of charges. You look around and are met with a number of bewildered, frightened, and confused looks. The clerks of the Administratum seem to have worked hard to make the obviously feigned proceedings look like a genuine trial.{/n}
